name: fairyland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the place where fairies (= imaginary creatures) are said to live
[ S ] approving a beautiful place with an attractive or special quality: It had snowed heavily during the night and in the morning the city was a white fairyland.
[ U ] mainly UK disapproving an imaginary perfect place or situation, where you do not have to deal with real problems in a practical way: The Minister's argument belongs to fairyland.
